infos.title: The Dangerous Doctor
infos.story: A practitioner of the medical arts developed when priests were short in supply. She inherited her natural medical talent from her father, but her thirst for knowledge crossed the line when she began researching poison. As a result, she was excommunicated from medical society, but her enthusiasm for research was seemingly unaffected. However, her basic respect for lelife kept her from achieving any experimental results for her poison research. When the Demons appeared, she became overjoyed at finding rare and precious test subjects.
infos.story_: A practitioner of the medical arts developed when priests were short in supply. She inherited her natural medical talent from her father, but her thirst for knowledge crossed the line when she began researching poison. As a result, she was excommunicated from medical society, but her enthusiasm for research was seemingly unaffected. However, her basic respect for life kept her from achieving any experimental results for her poison research. When the Demons appeared, she became overjoyed at finding rare and precious test subjects.

1.name: Healing Salve
1.description: Heals all allies by ??? and makes them immune to the next single hit of DMG.

2.name: Special Water Cannon
2.description: Fires a water cannon in a frontal direction for 6 sec, healing allies in range of ??? HP every 0.5 sec, and dealing ??? P.DMG to the enemy.

3.name: Strengthening Potion
3.description: Injects the ally with the highest ATK with a strengthening potion, increasing their ATK by 20%+ ??? of Mediana's ATK and keeping their HP from falling below 5% for 15 sec.

4.name: Mediana's Special Poison
4.description: Increases all allies' ATK by ??? and P.Crit Resistance by 200. Upon attack, injects the enemy with a special poison that deals ??? P.DMG over time for 5 sec and reduces P.Crit Resistance by 200. If the are 2 or more allies, Mediana will not be targeted as the ally with the highest ATK.

2.II: DMG and Heal Rate are increased by 10%.
2.III: DMG and Heal Rate are increased by 15%.
2.IV: DMG and Heal Rate are increased by 25%.

4.IV: All allies' P.Block is increased by 150.

light.effect: Boosts healed ally ATK by 10% for 10 sec.
DMG and Heal rate are increased by 40%.

dark.effect: Gain CC immunity while using said skill.

light.effect: Increases own DMG dealt to enemies by 20% and allows self to be targeted as the ally with the highest ATK.

dark.effect: When Mediana takes DMG, all allies gain 2% ATK. This effect stacks 20 times.

uw.name: Merciful Threat, Phistonia
uw.description: Special Poison DMG is increased by (0) and increases P.DMG the targets inflicted with Special Poison takes by (1) for 3 sec. If the target is hit by an ally other than Mediana, the target takes additional P.DMG equal to (2) of Mediana's ATK. The additional P.DMG effect activates only once every 1 sec.
uw.story: The story goes back to when Mediana's poison experiments were still being kept secret from her peers. One day, a fellow doctor noticed the giant syringe she had made. Impressed by its sheer size, he asked her: 'Look at the size of that thing. Shouldn't you at least give it a name?' To this, Mediana replied, nonchalantly: 'Oh... Just call it... Piston.'

1.name: Strangely Healthy Injection
1.description: [Healing Salve] Increases Heal Rate by 50%, and for 10 sec, increases the target's Crit DMG by (0).
1.story: A collection of Mediana's special healthy injections. These liquids are all made up of unknown substances and have a mystical glimmer. These were made with folk remedies that Mediana learned from every corner of the continent. Mediana insists that they provide recovery, but their abuse can lead to some extreme results.

2.name: Special Potion of Double Reaction
2.description: [Special Water Cannon] Increases Resistance by 30% and reduces Cooldown by (0).
2.story: A special potion that has two type of effects. Mediana wondered if there was a way to handle attack and recovery at once. She went to the library and read a dusty book called 'Slimes Can Also Make Cannons.' Mediana was reading just for fun, but found a way to apply the principle of cannons into her piston. She was then able to invent the Special Potion of Double Reaction and maximize recovery and attack when using Special Water Cannon. Mediana is still thankful to the author of the book who gave her the inspiration.

3.name: Mysterious Potion
3.description: [Strengthening Potion] Dispels target's negative effects and target gains immunity to CC for (0) sec.
3.story: A special potion that has the teachings of a master. The genius surgeon and expert on anatomy, Doctor Aldini, is Mediana's master. Doctor Aldini recognized her talent early on, and he taught her extraordinary medical knowledge that couldn't have been imagined in the Church of Lua. The unidentifiable potion that was made with her master's special recipe increases the effect of the Strengthening Potion.

4.name: Old Medical Report
4.description: [Mediana's Special Poison] Increases ATK boost by 50%. All allies take (0) reduced P.DMG.
4.story: A strange medical test report that Doctor Aldini gave to his student, Mediana. For a long time, he had kept notes about the autopsies he performed, and handed the records to Mediana, hoping that the traditional art of medicine would live on in her hands. Filled with joy, she has read it numerous times, and it was this report that made Mediana's Special Poison possible.

sw.description: Summons the Soul of Merciful Threat, Phistonia, increasing ATK of the ally with the highest ATK equal to 20% of Mediana's ATK for 10 sec, and healing a total of ??? HP of the target and Mediana over 10 sec.

advancement.1: For the duration of Skill, Mediana and the target recovers 400 Mana every 1 sec.

sw.story:
Phistonia, Mediana's unique gigantic syringe, has contained many different samples and antibodies from the past experiments.
Because Phistonia had once contained the blood of Demons, Dragons, and even demonic beasts, the remains of that power from those fluids started forming a maelstrom of power within Phistonia. It got to the point where even Mediana, who had limited knowledge on otherworldly power, could feel that there's something wrong.
And when she finally combined these samples from things that cannot be named to make an antibody, it started to shine brightly.

Mediana pushed the antibody into Phistonia, and at that moment, a vortex of power exploded. The mixture inside Phistonia went through evaporation, and an energy in the purest form was born. A soul to succeed Mediana's will to experiment and research, had awakened.
